data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A little hole will appear in the middle of the cap. Pick ____ 5 - 6 ____ in ____ edge ____ the ____, ____ knit a little ____, ____ stitch ____ less ____ in ____ cap. Knit 6 - 8 rows ____ cast ____ very ____. The end will roll by itself, but you may sew it together with the end of the thread if you want.
data.partBlankContent: A little hole will appear in the middle of the cap. Pick u_ 5 - 6 stit____ in t__ edge o_ the ho__, a__ knit a little e__, o__ stitch si__ less th__ in t__ cap. Knit 6 - 8 rows a__ cast o__ very ti___. The end will roll by itself, but you may sew it together with the end of the thread if you want.
data.fullContent: A little hole will appear in the middle of the cap. Pick up 5 - 6 stitches in the edge of the hole, and knit a little end, one stitch size less than in the cap. Knit 6 - 8 rows and cast off very tight. The end will roll by itself, but you may sew it together with the end of the thread if you want.
data.answer: 在帽的中间会出现一个小洞。在洞的边缘缝5 - 6针，然后在帽的末端织一个小洞，比帽的针小1针。织6 - 8行，脱紧。线的末端会自己滚动，但如果你愿意，你可以用线的末端把它缝在一起。
